remarks: Coefficient vector of a polynomial multiplied on the left by a scalar. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1sclmul.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1sclmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1sclmul.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
coe1sclmul.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
coe1sclmul.t $e |- .xb = ( .r ` P ) $.
coe1sclmul.u $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
coe1sclmul $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` ( ( A ` X ) .xb Y ) ) = ( ( NN0 X. { X } ) oF .x. ( coe1 ` Y ) ) ) $.
